page.title: 09CHALFONT AREA SCHOOLS
page.content: LOVEL END FIRST {SCHOOL} has approx.35 children per class. CHALFONT SECONDARY {SCHOOL} has 850 pupils and 76 staff, there are about 26 pupils per class. In ST.JOSEPHS there are 236 children, 11 staff and 10 classes.It stands in 14 acres of ground. THORPE HOUSE, a {private} {school} has 247 boys there are 13 classes. HOLY CROSS CONVENT a day and boarding {school}, has 20 small classes.The {school} owns 27 acres. GAYHURST BOYS SCHOOL is a small {school} with only 216 pupils. JORDANS COUNTY FIRST {SCHOOL} has only 21 on roll.It is a 1.1 teacher school. SEER GREEN C.ofE.COMBINED {SCHOOL} has 213 on roll.It has 8 members of staff. CHALFONT ST PETER C.ofE.MIDDLE {SCHOOL} has 340 pupils and 13 staff.It is a mixture of architectural styles.
